scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter ./packages/shared-types run build && pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C firebase/functions build
scripts.prepare:functions: pnpm -C packages/shared-types build && pnpm -C firebase run sync:types
scripts.dev:functions: pnpm run prepare:functions && pnpm -C firebase/functions serve
scripts.emulators: pnpm run prepare:functions && pnpm -C firebase emulators
